name: An Eternity, Reflecting
description:
A young woman returns to her childhood home to see her estranged Father.

Credits

-Matt Frith: Things

-Rob Potter: Music https://soundcloud.com/octarob

Game track - https://soundcloud.com/octarob/reflection

Directions

-Run exe. Run winsetup if you want to change settings.
-Left click to interact and select Inventory Items.
-Right Click to look at Inventory Items.

Running in a window recommended.

Made in 2 weeks for #AdvJam2019

Check out the other games!
